headline: CoStar Group (CSGP): Evaluating Valuation as Legal Dispute Over MLS Data Raises New Questions for Homes.com
summary: CoStar Group (CSGP) is now facing a legal challenge from REcore Solutions, which has filed a breach of contract lawsuit tied to unpaid fees for MLS data used by Homes.com. This development could reshape CoStar’s relationships with MLS data partners. See our latest analysis for CoStar Group. The breach of contract lawsuit comes during a volatile period for CoStar Group’s stock. While the one-day share price return of 0.3% and a robust 5.3% jump over the past week reflect some renewed investor...
